接口 IMarshaller

public interface IMarshaller

Representation marshaller.

1.0

方法详细信息

getRepresentation

java.lang.String getRepresentation()
Get the representation this marshaller handles..

返回：
representation name.

read

<T> T read(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
           java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
       throws java.io.IOException,
              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Read the representation from inputStream.

参数：
inputStream - representation inputStream.
clazz - class of the instance unmarshalled from the inputStream.
返回：
instance unmarshalled from the inputStream.
抛出：
java.io.IOException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

write

void write(java.lang.Object dataObject,
           java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
           throws java.io.IOException
Write a domain data object to outputStream.

参数：
dataObject - a domain data object.
outputStream - representation outputStream.
抛出：
java.io.IOException

setClassLoader

void setClassLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
Set the class loader this marshaller used when unmarshalling a representation inputStream.

参数：
classLoader -
